string.text: There's an abandoned stalker grave nearby, and no one ever goes there anymore. Might make a good place for a stash!
I found a bunch of boxes meant for radioactive waste. Looked inside and it was all empty. I'll drop off my junk here. Nobody else looks through this stuff, right?
There's a building along the road to the Army Warehouses where no one ever enters. Looks like a great place for stashing away.
Finally figured out where that bastard's hiding his loot! Once everyone goes away, that's my chance to clean out his stuff.
Been six months since he passed away. These things he left behind... they've been gnawing away at me. Only right thing to do is take it all to his grave.
Duty has a small arsenal not far from where the technician stays. One of them was stashing something in an empty waste bin.
I'll save up my medical supplies for when I go deeper into the center. It's a perfect spot â€” I've got my boys nearby along with the gallant Duty guard.
Sanya Bottleman's personal stash. It apparently contains a Jellyfish artefact.
